name: Jumanji - Endless Chaos
description:
Jumanji - Endless Chaos is inspired from Jumanji Movie. 

In Game, there is random effects you will face. But be careful sometimes effects can be multiplied. 


Random Effects:

  • Lightning
  • Meteor
  • Landslide
  • Inverted Colors
  • Inverted Screen

Movement is simple: wasd and mouse. To roll dice, go near table and press E.

Note: It contains full of chaos, if you don't like chaos think twice before open the game.
